price: Na anka nnipa (nyinaa) yε ͻman baako, εna (akyire yi) wͻn ntam teteeε. Na εnyε sε asεm no adikan wͻ wo Wura Nyankopͻn hͻ (sε Atemmuda na Ɔbɛbu nnipa ntam atεn) a, nokorε sε anka Wabu wͻn ntam atεn (dadaada) wͻ deε wͻnte wͻn ho ase wͻ ho no ho.
arabic: وَمَا كَانَ ٱلنَّاسُ إِلَّآ أُمَّةٗ وَٰحِدَةٗ فَٱخۡتَلَفُواْۚ وَلَوۡلَا كَلِمَةٞ سَبَقَتۡ مِن رَّبِّكَ لَقُضِيَ بَيۡنَهُمۡ فِيمَا فِيهِ يَخۡتَلِفُونَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: wamā kāna al-nāsu illā ummatan wāḥidatan fa-ikh'talafū walawlā kalimatun sabaqat min rabbika laquḍiya baynahum fīmā fīhi yakhtalifūna
